Interface Damageable

All Known Implementing Classes:
Boss, DragonBoss, GolemBoss, SkeletonBoss, SlimeBoss
public interface Damageable
Defines the contract for any game entity that has health points and can take damage. Currently implemented by the abstract Boss class, but can be extended to any entity (e.g., a destructible obstacle, a player avatar, etc.).

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    int
    getHealth()
    Returns the current health of this entity.
    int
    getMaxHealth()
    Returns the maximum health of this entity.
    boolean
    isAlive()
    Checks whether this entity is still alive (health > 0).
    void
    takeDamage(int amount)
    Inflicts the specified amount of damage on this entity.

  • Method Details

    • takeDamage

      void takeDamage(int amount)
      Inflicts the specified amount of damage on this entity. Health should not drop below zero.
      Parameters:
      amount - the amount of damage to deal (must be >= 0)

    • getHealth

      int getHealth()
      Returns the current health of this entity.
      Returns:
      current health points

    • getMaxHealth

      int getMaxHealth()
      Returns the maximum health of this entity.
      Returns:
      maximum health points

    • isAlive

      boolean isAlive()
      Checks whether this entity is still alive (health > 0).
      Returns:
      true if health > 0, false otherwise
